articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Sunchon Cement Complex
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Sunchon Cement Complex
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Sunchon Cement Complex.
					 Looking round various places of the complex, he encouraged workers of the complex who fluttered the flag of victory at the height of cement production by making massive innovations at the 200-day campaign of loyalty.
					
					 The consultative meeting was held on the spot at which the measures to fully supply cement necessary for various fields of national economy by carrying out the daily and monthly production plan were taken.
					
					 The premier also looked round the Sunchon Nitro-Lime Fertilizer Factory and the Sunchon Lagging Factory and organized the work to keep fertilizer production going at a high rate and produce building materials in good time.

articles.title: Credentials to Guinean President
articles.content:
Credentials to Guinean President
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Guinean President Alpha Conde sincerely wished respected Supreme Leader HE Kim Jong Un good health and happiness.
					 He said this when he met with Ri Chong Gyong, DPRK ambassador to Guinea, after receiving his credentials on January 26.
					
					 He sincerely hoped that the Korean people would achieve greater success in the struggle for reunifying the country and building a socialist power under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Since the independence of Guinea, the friendly relations between Guinea and the DPRK have proudly recorded a nearly 60 year-history, he said.
					
					 The Guinean government and people reaffirm that they would as ever consolidate the friendly relations between the two countries, he added.

articles.title: National Circus Gives Performance in Hamhung
articles.content:
National Circus Gives Performance in Hamhung
 Hamhung, January 30 (KCNA) -- The National Circus gave a performance at the Hamhug Grand Theater from Jan. 25.
					 Officials and labor innovators of institutions and industrial establishments and working and people from all walks of life in Hamhung City enjoyed the performance.
					
					 The performance started amid the playing of song "Joy of the People". Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as physical acrobatics, magic and comedy circus.
					
					 Through numbers of high ideological value, artistry and agile skills the performers showed the appearance of the Korean people struggling to kindle the flame of working new miracles and performing feats day by day.
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Devotion for Tree-Planting
articles.content:
Devotion for Tree-Planting
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- There are a number of people dedicating themselves to tree planting in the DPRK.
					 Han Nam Hyok, a forest ranger of the Anbyon County Forestry Management Station in Kangwon Province, has produced more than 170,000 saplings with his family every year.
					
					 Kim Ju Chol, a forest ranger of the Thaethan County Forestry Management Station in South Hwanghae Province, has had a care of over 1,000 hectares of forest for more than 10 years.
					
					 His family planted chestnut trees in 10-odd hectares and created habitat for wildlife by building over 500 nests and laying thousands of salt pouches.
					
					 Ri Jong Hui, a forest ranger of the Thaethan County Forestry Management Station in South Hwanghae Province, set up a tree nursery to have produced hundreds of thousands of saplings.
					
					 Housewives in Hakchon-ri, Kangso District of Nampho City, have planted trees in 50 hectares. 
					
					 Among those devoting themselves to forestation are So Sung Won, a forest ranger of the Kapsan County Forestry Management Station in Ryanggang Province, and his family and Pak Kyong Nam, a forest ranger of Pongsan County Forestry Management Station in North Hwanghae Province, and his brothers and sisters.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Crimes Can Never Be Concealed: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Crimes Can Never Be Concealed: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- It is 59 years since the U.S. officially made public its plan to introduce nuclear weapons to south Korea. 
					Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article says in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. made it its policy to introduce nuclear weapons to south Korea. On Jan. 29, 1958 it made public in the name of the "UN Forces Command" that it brought into south Korea Honest John nuclear missile, 280 mm atomic gun and B-61 nuclear bomb, etc.
					
					 This was an open nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK and a planned move to inflict the holocaust of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The U.S. deployment of nuclear weapons in south Korea started before that. In order to retrieve its repeated defeats in the Korean war the U.S. attempted to use A-bomb. In the subsequent period, it massively introduced into south Korea nuclear attack means including nuclear missiles and nuclear bombs with all missions. It also ceaselessly staged nuclear war exercises in order to use those huge nuclear weapons it deployed in south Korea for a nuclear war against the DPRK. 
					
					 The situation clearly proves that the U.S. is the chief culprit which spawned the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula as it introduced nuclear weapons into south Korea and has been keen on the moves for provoking a nuclear war against the north. This shows that unless the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is withdrawn, the danger of a nuclear war will continue to hover over the peninsula.
					
					 With no sleight of hand can the U.S. evade the responsibility of causing the nuclear issue on the peninsula and such a dangerous phase in which a nuclear war may break out any moment.

articles.title: Big Powers' Scramble for Hegemony Is Root Cause of Escalating Tension in Northeast Asia: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Big Powers' Scramble for Hegemony Is Root Cause of Escalating Tension in Northeast Asia: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Some experts in international affairs in some countries are speaking ill of the measures for self-defence taken by the DPRK and floating rumor that those measures have been a cause of escalating tension in Northeast Asia. They even let out such groundless remarks that the inter-continental ballistic rocket test-fire which the DPRK is going to carry out as part of its efforts for bolstering its capacity for self-defence would prompt the U.S. earlier deployment of THAAD in south Korea and aggravate relations among neighboring countries.
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Monday terms this sheer sophism.
					
					 The tension escalating in Northeast Asia is attributable to the U.S. provocative military moves and scramble of regional big powers for hegemony, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the U.S. calculation that only when it holds control of Northeast Asia, can it put the whole Asia-Pacific and the rest of the world under its control. There is a potential rival which it deems can challenge it here. That is China.
					
					 The U.S. is pursuing the strategy to militarily encircle and contain China.
					
					 China is also aware that the U.S. is seeking to contain it by putting military pressure on it. China is girding itself for any contingency, thinking that THAAD the U.S. is going to deploy in south Korea is targeted against China.
					
					 The military stand-off between China and the U.S. aimed to contain the rival by force is escalating arms race in Northeast Asia and sparking off new Cold War there.
					
					 Military conflicts between China and Japan are also acute.
					
					 China-Japan relations are beset with a great danger in which even a small accidental event may spill over into a large-scale military conflict. This is rendering the regional situation tense.
					
					 Such being a hard fact, it is quite illogical to call the self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK to defend its sovereignty and peace on the peninsula a factor of escalating tension.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Rubbish Ridiculed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Rubbish Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- There was a plenary meeting of the Policy Advisory Committee of the puppet Unification Ministry of south Korea at the "south-north dialogue headquarters" in Seoul recently. There traitor Hong Yong Phyo, minister of Unification, said that now is a "crucial watershed", talking about "denuclearization and human rights" and "change of the north".
					 He also claimed that they have made "lots of efforts to advance the denuclearization of north", while calling for "building a foundation for peace and peaceful unification".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday, commenting on this, says that Hong's rubbish is a revelation of his sinister intention to keep the dangerous phase of north-south confrontation and escalation of tension and realize his sordid ambition for stifling the fellow countrymen by maintaining traitor Park Geun Hye's "policy toward the north" aimed at making "the north dismantle nuclear program and opt for change".
					
					 This clearly proves that Hong is a hideous confrontational-minded maniac keen on stifling the fellow countrymen, indifferent to improving the north-south relations, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Traitor Hong's recent remarks about "denuclearization and human rights" and "change" disclosed his despicable nature as an imbecile bereft of elementary ability of discerning the situation and reason. 
					
					 Hong is making useless efforts to defend old Chongwadae granny and push forward the confrontational policy to prolong his remaining days.
					
					 Bete noire Hong will only meet ruin, cursed and denounced by the whole nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Slams Park Geun Hye for Her Assertion
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Slams Park Geun Hye for Her Assertion
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea reportedly issued a statement on Jan. 26 denouncing puppet traitor Park Geun Hye for her assertion of denying her suspected crimes.
					 The statement noted that Park Geun Hye held a press conference at which she asserted that the "incident of Choe Sun Sil is the great mountain pilled up with lies" and and floated "story of hatching plots".
					
					 If Park wants to prove her innocence, she must not spread groundless story but respond to special investigation and the "constitutional court" hearing, it noted.
					
					 Park's attempt to delay the decision on impeachment by the "constitutional court" will only prove that she has no qualifications as "president".

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Demands Hwang Kyo An Step Down
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Demands Hwang Kyo An Step Down
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty in south Korea on Jan. 25 held a press conference denouncing puppet Prime Minister Hwang Kyo An for his rubbish assertion, according to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Hwang's assertion for early THAAD deployment is thorough ignorance of the demand of the people, it noted, adding that it is the excess of authority as an acting "president" to try to press for such important issues on which hinges the future.
					
					 What the prime minister should do is to make an apology before the people and step down, not to act "president", it held.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in India
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in India
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- An Indian preparatory committee for celebrating the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed on January 24.
					 Atle Ranjan, secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from January 25 to February 16 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events to praise the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for socialist construction in the DPRK, independent and peaceful reunification of the country and the human cause of independence in the period.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Libya
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Libya
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- A Libyan preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star, birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, was formed on January 24.
					 The chairman of the Libya-DPRK Friendship Association was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events such as seminar, film show and book exhibition to praise the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on these anniversaries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Tanzania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Tanzania
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- A Tanzanian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Dar es Salaam on January 21.
					 Francis F. Lyimo, chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in the period from January 21 to February 16.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre el Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre el Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon
Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju recorrio el Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon.
					En varios lugares de la empresa Park estimulo a los obreros quienes cumplieron el plan de produccion de cemento al registrar innovaciones masivas durante le campana de 200 dias de la fidelidad. 
					
					En la reunion consultiva efectuada se tomaron las medidas destinadas a cumplir los planes de produccion por dias y meses a fin de asegurar con satisfaccion el cemento necesario a varios sectores de la economia nacional. 
					
					Por otra parte, Pak estuvo la Fabrica de Cianamida de Calcio de Sunchon y la Fabrica de Aislantes Termicos de Sunchon donde tomo las medidas para normalizar la produccion de abono y producir y suministrar a tiempo los materiales necesarios a la construccion.

articles.title: Presidente guineo expresa voluntad de fortalecer relaciones de amistad con RPDC
articles.content:
Presidente guineo expresa voluntad de fortalecer relaciones de amistad con RPDC
Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ACNC) -- El nuevo embajador coreano Ri Chong Gyong presento el dia 26 sus cartas credenciales a Alpha Conde, presidente de la Republica de Guinea. 
					En la ocasion, el mandatario guineo formulo sinceros votos por la salud y felicidad de Su Excelencia Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, y prosiguio:
					
					Deseo con sinceridad que el pueblo coreano obtenga mayores exitos en la lucha por lograr la reunificacion de la patria y construir una potencia socialista bajo la sabia orientacion de Su Excelencia Maximo Dirigente.
					
					Las relaciones de amistad establecidas entre Guinea y la RPDC establecidas despues de la independencia de Guinea duran casi 60 anos.
					
					Reafirmo que en el futuro tambien, el gobierno y el pueblo guineos fortaleceran y desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad entre dos paises.

articles.title: EE.UU. es autor de problema nuclear de Peninsula Coreana, subraya Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
EE.UU. es autor de problema nuclear de Peninsula Coreana, subraya Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto en su edicion fechada 30 el articulo individual recordando que se cumplen 59 anos desde cuando Estados Unidos publicara oficialmente la introduccion de las armas nucleares en el Sur de Corea.
					 Luego de politizar la introduccion de estas armas en el Sur de Corea, el pais norteamericano publico el dia 29 de enero de 1958 la ubicacion del misil nuclear Honest John, el canon atomico de 280mm de calibre, la bomba nuclear B-61, etc. en el territorio surcoreano, comienza el articulista y prosigue:
					
					  Esto deviene la abierta amenaza y chantaje nucleares contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la maniobra planificada tendente a imponer la calamidad de guerra nuclear a la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region del Noreste Asiatico.
					
					  Francamente dicho, EE.UU. emplazo ya hace mucho tiempo las armas nucleares en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  El imperio yanqui intento usar la bomba atomica para liberarse de las derrotas reiteradas en el periodo de la guerra coreana pasada y despues introdujo los misiles nucleares de varios tipos, las bombas nucleares y otros medios de ataque nuclear en la extension surcoreana. Sobre todo, desarrollo incesantemente los ejercicios de guerra nuclear para emplear numerosas armas nucleares ubicadas en el Sur de Corea en la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					  La realidad demuestra que EE.UU. es el autor que causo el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana introduciendo en el Sur de Corea las armas nucleares y recurriendo con frenesi a las maniobras belicas contra la RPDC y no se eliminara el peligro del estallido de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana mientras que EE.UU. no retire la politica hostil al pais socialista.
					
					  EE.UU. no puede eludir jamas la responsabilidad de haber generado el problema nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y creado la situacion tan tirante como hoy.

articles.title: Disputa hegemonica es factor de agravacion de Nordeste Asiatico, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Disputa hegemonica es factor de agravacion de Nordeste Asiatico, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ACNC) -- Ahora, los especialistas en los asuntos internacionales de algunos paises divulgan el rumor de que se exacerba la situacion del Nordeste Asiatico debido a las medidas autodefensivas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Para colmo, acusan el lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM de la RPDC, que se realizara para consolidar la capacidad de autodefensa nacional, insistiendo en que esta accion militar fomentara la ubicacion de THAAD en el Sur de Corea por EE.UU. y exacerbara las relaciones con los paises circunvecinos.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun hizo publico el dia 30 un comentario individual denunciando las sofisterias.
					
					La exacerbacion de la situacion de la region del Nordeste Asiatico se debe a las provocativas maniobras belicas de EE.UU. y a la disputa por la hegemonia de las potencias, subraya el comentarista y continua:
					
					EE.UU. calcula que puede dominar toda la region de Asia-Pacifico y el resto del mundo, solo cuando tome la hegemonia en la region del Nordeste Asiatico. Pero, el tiene un desafiante rival potencial, o sea, China.
					
					EE.UU. recurre a la estrategia de bloquear y reprimir de manera militar a China, que lo conoce.
					
					Por eso, el pais asiatico hace preparativos necesarios a hacer frente al caso emergente, considerando que el blanco de "THAAD" de EE.UU. que se ubicara en la extension surcoreana es precisamente su pais.
					
					La confrontacion militar China-EE.UU. tendente a reprimir a su contraparte agrava la carrera armamentista en el Nordeste Asiatico y trae alli nueva guerra fia.
					
					Tambien, la confrontacion militar entre China y Japon es tan tirante en la que un incidente eventual puede producir un gran choque militar, lo cual exacerba la situacion de la region.
					
					Por tanto, son absurdas las tonterias que describen como si fueran el factor principal de la exacerbacion de la tension las medidas autodefensivas de la RPDC tomadas para defender su soberania y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
